Package com.terturl.MMO.Player

Class MMOPlayer

java.lang.Object
com.terturl.MMO.Player.MMOPlayer
public class MMOPlayer extends Object
Handles the interaction and integration of all MMOClasses into a single object as well as all quest viewing and completed quest viewing
Since:
0.25.0
Author:
Sean Rahman

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addQuest​(Quest q)
    Add a quest to the players current MMOClass
    void
    updateAndTakeDamage()
    Used to check if the player is in combat or not, will create a bossbar above the players UI so they know when they are no longer in combat
    void
    updateNPCQuests()
    Update every NPC to check if they have a givable quest or if the player can complete a quest from that NPC
